â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

Grace: "I understand why I'm being scrutinized, and I want to address Bob's concerns directly. 
Yes, I was defensive when Kate made her accusation about Ivy and me 'coordinating' - but that's 
because it felt like a desperate attempt to create suspicion from nothing. We were all just 
having normal Day 1 discussion. Now that Ivy is dead and was actually the Detective, it's clear 
Kate was grasping at straws to save herself. The real question we should be asking is: who 
benefits most from this chaos? With both our Detective and Doctor gone, the Mafia is in a strong
position. I think we need to look at who's been quietly letting others lead the discussion while
staying under the radar. Charlie has been particularly quiet, and Bob, while you're being 
analytical now, you were also part of the group that executed our Doctor. We can't just point 
fingers at those who were vocal - sometimes the quiet ones are the most dangerous."

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚

â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚

night and was indeed the Detective. This means Kate was telling the truth when she said Ivy was 
lying about being the Detective and leading the charge against her. Ivy, as the Detective, 
voting to execute the Doctor is utterly inexplicable unless she was Mafia. Grace, your 
aggressive defensiveness yesterday when Kate first mentioned you and Ivy coordinating, and your 
strong push against Kate, is now extremely suspicious. I believe we need to scrutinize Grace 
very closely. The Mafia successfully eliminated both our Doctor and our Detective because we, 
the Town, were misled."

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚

â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚

â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚

â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚

â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚

â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚

â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚ Today was Day 1 of the Mafia game, and it was a challenging start for the Town. We began the â”‚
â”‚ day with the unfortunate news that Alice, a Villager, was killed by the Mafia during the     â”‚
â”‚ night. Additionally, Kate, who claimed to be the Doctor, was executed after a trial, leaving â”‚
â”‚ us without a Doctor for protection at night.                                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ The day began with a discussion where everyone emphasized the importance of being cautious   â”‚
â”‚ and observing behavior to identify the Mafia. Ivy, Jack, Olivia, Bob, Grace, and I all       â”‚
â”‚ contributed to the discussion, with a general consensus on the need for careful observation  â”‚
â”‚ and logical reasoning. However, there were subtle differences in how people approached the   â”‚
â”‚ discussion:                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Ivy and Jack both emphasized listening to initial reactions and looking for those who     â”‚
â”‚    might be trying to steer the conversation or remain too quiet.                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Kate pointed out the similarity in Ivy and Jack's points and suggested considering why    â”‚
â”‚    Alice might have been targeted.                                                           â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Olivia and Bob focused on the importance of not rushing into conclusions, with Bob        â”‚
â”‚    particularly interested in seeing if anyone quickly pushed for nominations or avoided     â”‚
â”‚    input.                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Grace expressed concern about playing too safe and suggested looking for confidence       â”‚
â”‚    levels in discussions as potential indicators of Mafia behavior.                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ During the nomination phase, Kate received five votes (from Ivy, Jack, Bob, Grace, and me),  â”‚
â”‚ while Ivy received two votes (from Kate and Olivia). This led to Kate going to trial.        â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ In the trial, Kate claimed to be the Doctor and argued that her analysis of behavior         â”‚
â”‚ patterns was genuine Town behavior. She accused Grace and Ivy of coordinating and deflecting â”‚
â”‚ attention away from themselves. However, Ivy, Jack, Olivia, Bob, Grace, and I all found her  â”‚
â”‚ defense suspicious, primarily due to the timing of her Doctor claim and her aggressive       â”‚
â”‚ accusations against others. We viewed her claim as a desperate attempt to avoid elimination  â”‚
â”‚ and ultimately voted guilty, resulting in her execution. Kate's claim of being the Doctor    â”‚
â”‚ was confirmed after her execution, which was a significant loss for the Town.                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Key takeaways and strategy moving forward:                                                   â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ We need to be more cautious about executing players who claim power roles, especially on  â”‚
â”‚    Day 1.                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ The Mafia may try to blend in by making generic statements or by pushing for aggressive   â”‚
â”‚    play under the guise of progress.                                                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ I need to pay close attention to voting patterns and the reasoning behind people's        â”‚
â”‚    accusations and defenses.                                                                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Observing how players react under scrutiny and during nominations will be crucial in      â”‚
â”‚    identifying Mafia members.                                                                â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ With the Doctor gone, we must be even more vigilant in our discussions and nominations to â”‚
â”‚    avoid further Town losses.                                                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ As a Villager, my role is to use logic and careful observation to help identify the Mafia    â”‚
â”‚ while contributing meaningfully to discussions. The loss of the Doctor means we must be      â”‚
â”‚ strategic in our approach to nominations and trials to protect the remaining Town members.   â”‚

Grace (defendant): "I am innocent! I am a Villager, and I've been trying to help Town find the 
real Mafia this entire time. The accusations against me are based on a fundamental 
misunderstanding. Yes, I was defensive when Kate accused Ivy and me of 'coordinating' - but 
that's because we WEREN'T coordinating, and it felt like a desperate attempt to create suspicion
from nothing. Kate was grasping at straws to save herself, and unfortunately, her desperate lies
worked to turn you all against me. Look at my actual behavior: I've been consistently 
analytical, I voted with the majority against Kate because her claim seemed like a panic move, 
and today I've been trying to redirect focus to players who've been flying under the radar like 
Charlie and Bob. If I were Mafia, why would I draw so much attention to myself with aggressive 
defenses? Real Mafia members blend in and stay quiet - they don't make themselves targets. Bob 
is the one who's really suspicious here - he's trying to use our tragic mistake of executing the
Doctor to paint me as Mafia, but his logic is completely flawed. He's twisting the situation to 
create confusion and misdirect from the real threats. Don't let the Mafia manipulate you into 
executing another innocent Town member!"

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

Jack: GUILTY - My apologies for my misjudgment on Day 1. However, much has changed. Ivy, the 
Detective, was killed by the Mafia last night. This means Kate's accusations now carry immense 
weight. Kate, our Doctor, explicitly accused Ivy of falsely claiming Detective and coordinating 
with Grace. If Ivy was truly the Detective, her voting to execute the Doctor is inexplicable. 
Grace's aggressive defensiveness to Kate's initial observation about her and Ivy, and her strong
push against Kate, is now extremely suspicious. She is trying to reframe Kate's valid 
accusations as 'desperate lies,' but the fact that Ivy was the Detective makes Kate's original 
statement about Ivy's 'false claim' much more plausible as a form of Mafia misdirection. Grace's
continuous aggressive posture and attempt to twist the narrative to her benefit, as well as 
accusing Bob of misdirection, is a common Mafia tactic. We cannot afford another mistake; Grace 
is too suspicious given the context of Ivy's death and Kate's original claims.

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
